channel.title: Programming on Whonix
channel.description:
Hi, I am pretty new to whonix. I would like to start programming with whonix. I plan to develop an application based on laravel, it will be a web page with backend. For this I currently use the Homestead enviroment and as an IDE I use PHP Storm.
Would that be possible on Whonix, too? Are there any limitations? As I understood it, I would install all that stuff in the workstation, right? Which OS runs the workstation?
Thanks.

item.title: Programming on Whonix

item.description:
